alert.note: Alert for Cheatham; Davidson; Montgomery; Robertson; Sumner (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 1:00PM CDT until July 01 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Davidson County in Middle Tennessee... East central Montgomery County in Middle Tennessee... Western Sumner County in Middle Tennessee... Northeastern Cheatham County in Middle Tennessee... Robertson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 130 PM CDT. * At 100 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Coopertown, or 11 miles north of Ashland City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Springfield, Hendersonville, Goodlettsville, White House, Millersville, Greenbrier, Coopertown, Ridgetop, Cross Plains, Pleasant View, Orlinda, Cedar Hill and Cottontown. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 98 and 118. Interstate 24 between mile markers 15 and 32. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
